metadata.name: Grand Rising
metadata.description:
Introducing 'Grand Rising', a limited edition digital masterpiece by the talented artist Adelf Menezes. This breathtaking artwork takes our name by incorporating our uplifting message and is the first work for sale by one of the community members.

Adelf Menezes is renowned for his meticulous attention to detail, bringing his artworks to life with vibrant colors and intricate textures. This masterpiece is no exception, featuring stunning details that truly captivate the viewer. From the lion's majestic dreadlocks mane to the ganja flowers, every element of the artwork has been carefully crafted to create a stunning visual experience inspired by his self journey.

As the proud owner of 'Grand Rising', you will receive a signed poster of the artwork numbered 1/100, adding to the exclusivity and authenticity of your collection. This piece is truly a must-have for those who appreciate the transformative power of art.
